moapi.api

Class ModOption<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • moapi.api.ModOption<E>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ModBooleanOption, ModKeyOption, ModMappedOption, ModMultiOption, ModSliderOption, ModTextOption

    public abstract class ModOption<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class for individual option classes
    Since:
    0.1

      • getDisplayString

        public java.lang.String getDisplayString(boolean localMode)
        Get the display string for the option, which will use a string formatter to decide the output of the text. Value is local value if localMode is true, otherwise global.
        Parameters:
        localMode - True if use local value
        Returns:
        display string
        Since:
        1.0.0
